info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:26PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern La Paz and eastern Imperial Counties through 515 PM MST/515 PM PDT/... At 425 PM MST/425 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 27 miles southwest of Palo Verde to 16 miles north of Andrade. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Areas of blowing dust may also develop due to the strong winds. Locations impacted include... Algodones Dunes and Glamis. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 81 and 87. CA Route 78 between mile markers 27 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
